ygData.subject: Off topic
ygData.msgSnippet: Just wanted to share a little tid bit for those of you who have charm... You may already know this, but if you don t: Last night I was hunting in Paw... DEEP
ygData.messageBody:
Just wanted to share a little tid bit for those of you who have charm...

You may already know this, but if you don't:

Last night I was hunting in Paw... DEEP Paw, we were going after the Robe.
A level 37 warrior in a party got charmed by a Rosch and started to beat on
us with his EXE axe (OUCH!). I've been dying to try this out forever and I
finally got my chance!! I switched from Pixieing the Nisch we were fighting
and targeted our warrior and charmed him! LOL! I sent him in to finish off
the Nisch and then had him sit down after battle. Just about bust a gut
laughing so hard.

Just another use for charm :-)

Taneran Dreamweaver
<Clan Jax>
Bard of the 41rst Song
Prexus


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
